author: Siamak Masnavi, CD Analytics
title: Bitcoin Rallies Above $102K After Panic Sellers Dump Into War Fears
description: Bitcoin fell to $101K before reversing sharply with high-volume support, as hedge fund James Lavish rebukes war-driven selling.
content:
Bitcoin (BTC) 
 rallied above $102,000 after briefly falling below $101,000 in a volatile session marked by unusually heavy trading, according to CoinDesk Research's technical analysis model. Market… [+1458 chars]
